alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 12:55AM MST until January 10 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County
